data.title: Jim Carrey's Wives, Girlfriends, And Dating History
data.meta_description: Jim Carrey's dating history has been a topic of fascination for fans, as the celebrated comedian and actor has been involved with numerous high-profile women ...
data.text:
Jim Carrey's dating history has been a topic of fascination for fans, as the celebrated comedian and actor has been involved with numerous high-profile women over the years. To present an updated and comprehensive account of his romantic experiences, our editors have meticulously researched various entertainment news sources and analyzed social media platforms.

Currently, Jim Carrey is not married and does not have a wife. He was previously in a relationship with Ginger Gonzaga, which began in 2019 but lasted less than a year. The duo made a charming couple on red carpets; however, their adorable connection was short-lived.

Looking back at Jim Carrey's ex-girlfriends and spouses, we can see a list that includes his two former wives. His first marriage was with actress Melissa Womer from 1987 to 1995, with whom he shares a daughter, Jane. In 1996, he tied the knot with Lauren Holly, his "Dumb and Dumber" co-star. Unfortunately, their union also ended within a year. Other notable relationships in Jim Carrey's dating history include his time with Ren√©e Zellweger in 1999 and the late Cathriona White, who he dated on-and-off between 2012 and 2015. Each of these relationships brought unique experiences and memories to Carrey's life.

For those captivated by the love life of this versatile actor, exploring the complete list of Jim Carrey's relationships is an engaging journey. Delve into the tales of romance, passion, and heartbreak that have unfolded alongside his successful career by investigating his intriguing dating history.
